nodes.npc_dialogue: Well, if it isn't my favorite concourse manager! Did you sprinkle stardust on that new dance floor, or is it just naturally that dazzling?

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Glad you noticed! We thought a touch of shimmer would brighten your afterlife.
Actually, the spirits seem to make it shine brighter!
Do you think it's too much sparkle? We could tone it down.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Oh, it's doing wonders! Feels like I'm dancing among the stars. You really know how to light up a room.

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Wait till you see the garden we're planning—it'll be a carnival of colors!
I'm glad you're enjoying it. Any suggestions?

nodes.npc_dialogue: Ah, flattery will get you everywhere! Maybe we're just a bright bunch, huh?

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Indeed! Would you like to contribute some of your stories to the ambiance?
Your happiness makes this place shine.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Too much? Oh no, it's perfect! Unless you're worried about causing spirit blindness.

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Just wanted to make sure it's up to your standards.
Maybe we should provide shades at the entrance?

nodes.npc_dialogue: A carnival garden? Now you're speaking my language! Will there be ethereal smoothies too?

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Absolutely! We'll serve the best blends this side of the afterlife.
Hmm, didn't think of that, but it's a great idea!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Suggestions? Well, a bar serving ethereal smoothies would be the cherry on top!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Consider it done! Anything for our favorite spirits.
Smoothies, you say? I'll see if we can whip up a recipe.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Contribute my stories? Oh, you might regret opening that door!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: I'm all ears! The more laughter, the better.
On second thought, maybe we should start with a few.

nodes.npc_dialogue: You sure know how to make a spirit feel special!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Only the best for our guests.
Just doing my job.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Your standards seem pretty high. Maybe you should let loose a little?

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: You might be right. Let's aim for more fun.
I just want everything to be perfect.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Shades at the entrance? Now that's a spirit of humor I like!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Glad you appreciate my joke.
Wait, were you being serious?

nodes.npc_dialogue: I can't wait! This place just keeps getting better. Here's a little something for your efforts.
Sounds good! Keep up the good work.
Well, perhaps perfection is overrated. Don't stress too much.
